Klasse StyleUtil

java.lang.Object
app.util.StyleUtil
public class StyleUtil extends Object
Utility class for styling and layout helpers used in the GUI.

    • setPadding

      public static void setPadding(JPanel panel, int top, int left, int bottom, int right)
      Sets empty padding around a panel using an EmptyBorder.
      Parameter:
      panel - the panel to set padding on
      top - padding at the top
      left - padding at the left
      bottom - padding at the bottom
      right - padding at the right
